short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens jsFiddle output to a single unified html page in a new window or tab with one click from the Omnibox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: jsFiddle is awesome, but sometimes you want to combine all your HTML, CSS & JS into a single HTML file (perhaps to save it to your local disk). jsFiddle Player does that, it simply adds a "play" button to the Omnibox so that you can pop open a new tab/window with the output combined into a single web page. That's it, simple & useful (at least for me)!
